newsitem.title: CANADA: Novopharm gets okay to market generic Prozac.
newsitem.headline: Novopharm gets okay to market generic Prozac.

text.p: NovoPharm Ltd has won the right to market a generic version of the anti-depressant medication Prozac, the company announced Thursday.
Judges of the Federal Court of Canada, Court of Appeal, on Wednesday overturned a March, 1996 injunction, preventing Novopharm from producing a drug in the same capsule colours as Prozac.
The court's decision allows Novopharm to immediately begin promoting and selling their anti-depressant Novo-Fluoxetine in the same size, shape and colour as Prozac across Canada.
Leslie Dan, Novopharm's chairman and chief executive, hailed the court ruling as "a major victory for Novopharm and for people who take fluoxetine hydrochloride to treat depression."
